sourcesContent:
import React, {Fragment, useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import {useSelector} from "react-redux"; import ReactPaginate from "react-paginate"; import {GetProductList} from "../APIRequest/APIRequest"; const ProductList = () => { let [searchKey,setSearchKey]=useState("0"); let [perPageKey,setPerPageKey]=useState(5); useEffect(()=>{ GetProductList(1,perPageKey,searchKey); },[searchKey, perPageKey]) let ALLProduct=useSelector((state)=>(state.products.ALLProduct)); let Total=useSelector((state)=>(state.products.Total)) const handlePageClick = (event) => { GetProductList(event.selected+1,perPageKey,searchKey) }; const searchData=()=>{ GetProductList(1,perPageKey,searchKey) } const PageKeyOnChange=(e)=>{ setPerPageKey(parseInt(e.target.value)) GetProductList(1,e.target.value,searchKey) } const searchOnChange=(e)=>{ setSearchKey(e.target.value) if((e.target.value).length===0){ setSearchKey("0") GetProductList(1,perPageKey,"0") } } return (
My Product List
{ ALLProduct.map((item,i)=> ) }
Product Price Stock Code
{item.title}

{item.category}

{item.brand}

{item.price} Taka

{item.stock}

 {item.product_code}
); }; export default ProductList;
